content.rendered:
Elitebet Preview.

In-depth Review.

There are a number of things that make this betting site stand out. The first one is the fact that it offers extensive football matches and also that one is able to deposit money either by mpesa or Airtel money.

Homepage.

Features.

One feature that greatly interests a lot of Kenyans is the fact that you do not need a lot of money to place a bet on elitebet. You can place a bet with as low as Ksh 10 and make good winnings. If you begin to compare elite bet with other international betting companies, then you will notice that the offs offered at elite et are comparatively lower. You will also notice that there are other features found in International betting sites that are grossly lacking in elitebet. Features such as casinos and cash out options are not there in this site and this discourages plenty of gamblers.

Registration.

Registering to a betting site has never been this easy. All you need to do is send money to business no. 850700, account no. elitebet. You will instantly receive a PIN number via SMS which you will use to log in online at www.elitebetkenya.com and you will be good to go.

Get more information about Helabet

Jackpot..

At elitebet, the jackpot comprises is made up of 15 games from which you get to win a total of Ksh 5,000, 000 grand prize. If you make good predictions and only miss to get a few matches correctly, there are a number of bonuses to be won. The first bonus goes to the person who makes 14 out of 15 correct predictions while the second one goes to the one who makes 13 out of 15 predictions.

Sports to bet on.

Football

Pros

No withdrawal fees

Affordable minimum deposit fee

Minimum withdrawal fees

Two mobile wallets, i.e., Safaricom and Airtel

Affordable amount to bet on the jackpot.

Accumulator bonuses available

Stake refund.

Virtual gaming available.

SMS betting available.

Cons

Deposit Fee.

Limited to one sport only.

Betting site not colorful and attractive.

Website not elaborate.

Low odds.

No live betting.

No cash out.

Does not offer many betting options.

Elitebet FAQ

How do I deposit from mpesa to elitebet?

All you need to do is go to M-PESA menu then to Lipa Na M-PESA ,Pay Bill , Enter business no. -> 850700 ,Enter account no. elitebet and finally Enter Amount. After this, you will receive a confirmation message acknowledging that your account has been credited with money. It is worth noting that the minimum amount you are required to deposit is Ksh 10.

How Do I withdraw?

Here, you ought to go to your online account and check out your account history. You will then go click on “withdraw” and enter how much you would like to withdraw. After this process is complete and your request is sent, it will take you some time for the money to be sent to your line.

How do I Withdraw via SMS?

Simply send an SMS written W, followed by the amount to wish to withdraw to 29210. You will then have to wait a few minutes before your account is credited with your withdrawal amount. The least amount of money you will be allowed to withdraw is ksh 50 while maximum amount you can withdraw is ksh 140,00 in a single day.

How to bet on Elitebet Kenya.

 Online Betting Go to our website www.elitebetkenya.com, select the Login -> Input Stake (Amount you wish to bet with-> Click on Next Normal Bet -> Make your selection(s) -> Click on Submit or on any ‘Go’ icon-> Confirm the Selection(s) -> Click on Place Bet SMS Betting The format for placing SMS bets is; MATCH CODE # Your Selection * Stake (Amount) Example: 5025#1*100 and send to 29210. For Multibets, join the various selections with a + and then put * Amount at the end Example: 6425#1+2600#2+1850#0*70. #1 is for the Home team to win #2 is for the Away team to win #0 is for a Draw. How to bet place a jackpot bet The jackpot can be played online or via SMS.

Betting sites in Kenya

How do I cancel a bet on elitebet kenya?

In order to cancel a bet on this site, one has to log into their account first then go  view your account history. You will then need to press on the bet reference number then consequently the cancel icon. In order for your cancellation to be successful, there are two conditions that ought to be met. The first condition is that none of the matches ought to have started and the second condition is that your cancellation request ought to be made at least an hour earlier.

What is the Elitebet kenya mpesa paybill number?

Their pay ill number is 850700.
